text: Choloviky pikluyutʹsya pro zhinok, adzhe Allah viddav perevahu odnym pered inshymy, a takozh cherez te, shcho choloviky vytrachayutʹ svoye mayno. Pravedni zhinky pokirni, vony berezhutʹ u chas vidsutnosti cholovikiv te, shcho Allah nakazav berehty. A tykh zhinok, nepokory yakykh vy boyitesʹ, povchayte, unykayte na podruzhnʹomu lozhi ta vreshti-resht zlehka byyte. Yakshcho zh vony poslukhayutʹsya vas, to ne shukayte shlyakhu proty nykh. Voistynu, Allah — Vsevyshniy, Velykyy
